name: Chicken Adlai Arrozcaldo
description: Indulge in a nourishing bowl of Chicken Adlai Arrozcaldo, a healthified twist on the classic Filipino comfort food. Perfect for those seeking high-protein, low-sodium, and low-sugar meal options, this arrozcaldo promises to warm your soul without compromising on health.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the carrots, mince the ginger root, and finely chop the red onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the chicken thigh into bite-size pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, combine 4 cups of water, the ginger, and the chicken pieces. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, then reduce the heat to simmer for 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rinsed Adlai Rice to the pot and continue simmering for 30 minutes, or until the rice is fully cooked and has absorbed most of the liquid.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the diced carrots, chopped red onions, garlic powder, and ground pepper. Cook for another 10 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
